DOC.detailed_description: Intra-articular injection hyaluronic acid ( HA ) corticosteroid ( CS ) widely use debate efficacy osteoarthritis ( OA ) . The aim present study investigate whether combined injection HA CS superior HA alone treatment knee OA .
DOC.criteria: According radiographic finding , patient suffer knee OA 3 month stage IIIV accord KellgrenLawrence ( KL ) grade senior radiologist . The diagnosis symptomatic knee OA base American Rheumatism Association classification criterion knee osteoarthritis . Exclusion criterion diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis inflammatory OA , presence trauma paincausing disease , treatment oral medication recent 3 day , physiotherapy intraarticular injection HA CS past 6 month .
